title: Bloomberg's Rye on Drug Price Battle Shifting to States (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg's Rye on Drug Price Battle Shifting to States (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. Guest: Brian Rye, Senior Healthcare Policy Analyst for Bloomberg Intelligence's Government Team, on how the battle over rising drug prices may shift from the federal level to the states.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
